toggle_long_press_to_reorder_widgets: Kwado/ Gbanyụọ ogologo pịa ka ọdọrọ wijetị

$ai_chat.intro: Ndewo! Abụ m onye na-ahụ maka ọgụgụ isi obodo gị. Kedu ka m ga-esi nyere gị aka?
$ai_chat.teaser_description: Jiri ike nke Generative AI mee ihe na ngwaike gị. Kpaa nkata, dee koodu, ma ọ bụ wuo akpaaka dị elu site na nchekwa nke sistemụ mpaghara na nkeonwe.
$ai_chat.loading_model: Na-ebugo ụdị ihe nlereanya n'ime ebe nchekwa... Nke a nwere ike were obere oge.
